author: ankitchiplunkar
content:
We did an EIP7702 whiteboarding session at ETHCC, and want to get additional feedback on some changes to the spec.
Writeup: https://hackmd.io/@S9AwbucvTS6GYodLz-G1SQ/S102UtTwA

The proposal, reduces work required to manage DOS, enables new use-cases and supports ephemeral SCAs.

author: lightclient
content: as mentioned in <#718596092828057631>, this proposal just reintroduces the issues we had with EOA migration (namely how to deal with ERCs like permit) and therefore I don't think it is a good direction
